name: Mesprit
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

poke_power.name: Psychic Bind
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Mesprit from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Your opponent can’t use any Poké-Powers on his or her Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Extrasensory
attacks.effect: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage.
